name: Sifting
wikiSummary: Post-Nevermind, Cobain described much of Bleach as "really one-dimensional" and further explained that "all the songs are slow and grungey, they're tuned down to really low notes and I scream a lot".  Sifting, then, is a quintessential Bleach song.
wikiText:
Post-Nevermind, Cobain described much of Bleach as "really one-dimensional" and further explained that "all the songs are slow and grungey, they're tuned down to really low notes and I scream a lot".
 
 Sifting, then, is a quintessential Bleach song.
